welcome.top: Bass Station wishes you all a
ticker: Return (from the beyond) every Saturday night for (mostly) living DJs!
Haunt our Discord and the VRChat group for the latest updates!
Keep your spirits up with regular water breaks~!
Let's split up gang! But don't worry, we'll keep in touch at the FEC Discord! Check the link from the VRC Group: FURRY.9622

performers.name: DJ Foxy
ticker: Beginning your trip to the underworld via Hardstyle!

performers.name: Alasky
ticker: Is that thumping the still living heart of your victim? If not, it's probably... some Drum and Bass!

performers.name: Oyem8
ticker: Who knows what to expect in the dark, or the DJ that plays... Multigenre~!

performers.name: **TERMINATES HERE**
ticker: This event terminates here. Goodnight out there..... whatever you are~
Please be mindful of wet ghostly goop that might be found on the station today. We'd hate for you to have an... unexpected trip~
Some services may be delayed due to ~Late~ passengers.
